description: This is an Android activity class definition for creating or editing notes in a note-taking application. It manages UI interactions, loads existing notes for editing if an ID is provided, and performs save or delete operations via a repository.

classes.name: NoteEditorActivity
classes.description: Android activity class for editing or creating notes with UI components and methods to handle user interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up UI components, and loads existing note data if an ID is provided.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Collects input data, creates or updates a Note object, and saves it via the repository.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes the current note if it exists.
